name: clean-browsing
description: A comprehensive browsing enhancement Chrome extension with customizable dashboard, universal sidepanel, and productivity widgets
author: Dimitri Meimaridis

scripts.test: echo 'Running extension validation tests' && node -e "const manifest = require('./extension/manifest.json'); console.log('Manifest valid:', manifest.name, manifest.version);"
scripts.build: echo 'No build process required - pure vanilla JS extension'
scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension/ folder in Chrome extensions (chrome://extensions)'
scripts.package:firefox: rm -rf dist/firefox && mkdir -p dist/firefox && rsync -a --exclude 'manifest.*.json' extension/ dist/firefox/ && cp extension/manifest.firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../clean-browsing-firefox-v$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version").zip .
scripts.dev:firefox: echo 'Load dist/firefox (or extension/ + rename manifest.firefox.json to manifest.json) in about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox'
scripts.lint: echo 'No linter configured - using browser dev tools for validation'
